title: 2 Good Suggestions
body:
1) Currently if you hold down "attack champions only" and click "attack move click" you will move and still attack minions.  Fix.

2) On champion select how you can buy skins for the champions without going into the shop:  If you have the skin shard from hextech chest you should be able to buy the skin with shards and essence aswell.

Thats all cheers.
